remarks.para: One sensing element on each engine may be inoperative provided both engine oil temperature indications are available from one EICAS computer.

numlitem.para: Manually select left and/or right EICAS computer to regain oil temperature indication. If oil temperature indication returns, leave EICAS computer at selected position.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "L (R) OIL TEMP ONE ELEMENT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
